overview: A cycle of timeless events and encounters are performed by mystic characters immersing the viewer into their world. With the aid of token items, two cryptic individuals navigate between parallel existences, living an astral projection, guided by each otherâ€™s truths.  Sterile and hostile at first sight, each environment is populated by a series of tightly knit clans that will witness their rites of passage.  Despite feelings of danger, care, seduction, and vulnerability, the two chameleonic figures take a leap of faith into the unknown: AMOR FATI
title: Amor Fati
